abstract: Three Internet providers in Britain have teamed up with a company called Phorm, whose technology tracks Web users and sends them ads related to their interests.
snippet: Three Internet providers in Britain have teamed up with a company called Phorm, whose technology tracks Web users and sends them ads related to their interests.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  For years, Internet service providers have watched with envy as the likes of Google, Yahoo and Microsoft sliced up the online advertising pie. Selling Internet access has been a good business, but selling Web advertising has been an even more lucrative one.

headline.main: 3 Internet Providers in Deal for Tailored Ads
headline.print_headline: 3 Internet Providers in Deal for Tailored Ads

abstract: A smooth integration between Microsoft and Yahoo will not be a matter of simply swapping one set of software or hardware for another. It may hinge on changing deep-seated mind-sets.
snippet: A smooth integration between Microsoft and Yahoo will not be a matter of simply swapping one set of software or hardware for another. It may hinge on changing deep-seated mind-sets.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  If Microsoft succeeds in its conquest of Yahoo, what then?

headline.main: Of All the Hurdles to a Merger, View on Technology Is the Highest
headline.print_headline: Of All the Hurdles to a Merger, View on Technology Is the Highest

byline.original: By John Markoff and Matt Richtel
